website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for cities with stringent low flow requirements. Designed for limited clearance space from wall and supply line.
pros: Complies with new low flow  laws

customer_reviews.title: Well made and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made with very good glazing. The base is built very close to the flange so the flooring has to be tight around that flange or it will show. The flush is a load throat clearing gurgle so if your bathroom is not somewhat insulated this could be annoying. It flushes well and rarely needs a second flush. We would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: High quality product at a great price for a 10" rough-in toilet
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality product, easy to install, extremely well packaged. I purchased from "Need Plumbing Supplies" and they were great. Great packaging so everything arrived in perfect condition, very fast shipping, quick response to my inquiries. Product works well, with simple assembly - you will need to purchase a wax ring, toilet seat, toilet bolts and I added a new flexible stainless supply line - as these do not come with the toilet. I'd also suggest some toilet shims just in case you need them. I would recommend both the product - there are not a ton of 10" rough toilets - as well as "Need Plumbing Supplies" as a seller.
customer_reviews.author: The Wood Man

customer_reviews.title: Mysterious flushing power
customer_reviews.text: This is a marvel of fluid dynamic engineering. The flush is anemic, and seems unlikely to clear toilet paper out of the bowl, let alone anything else. Yet it works perfectly. Amazing! And I love that saving water is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Daseinen

customer_reviews.title: I love this toilet.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a toilet in a location where there was not room for the standard 12" setback. This one worked well and I love that it has 2 flush options -- one when you need only a small flush and one for a full flush. Now I'm tempted to replace my other toilet!
customer_reviews.author: Patski

customer_reviews.title: The only one that would fit, looks great
customer_reviews.text: The plumber didn’t listen when we told him that we would install 2” insulation board, plywood and paneling. So he did not leave enough space for a toilet to be installed. Luckily we found this, as, from our research, it is the only toilet that would fit. It is installed and works great, looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this toilet really IS that good!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially skeptical whether this thing would do the heavy-duty work. I'm happy to report that it does, AND that it's breeze to clean. It also has clean, simple lines, so it looks nice. Bizarre to say this, but I love my Toto Eco Drake toilet.
customer_reviews.author: celestial blue

customer_reviews.title: Second Order was the Charm
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived and the tank lid was chipped (it looked like a previously purchased box). Amazon sent a full replacement order without a hassle and the toilet was finally installed. Had to buy a 1.28 GPF model as it's the new requirement in California and was concerned there might not be enough flush power ... but there is ... and it looks and works great! Good price for a Toto!
customer_reviews.author: City Girl

customer_reviews.title: toto cst744ef.10 toilet
customer_reviews.text: i have had this toilet about 9 mo. It flushes very well, and i have never had any problem with having to double flush to clear the toilet. My only complaint is that it requires cleaning VERY often. I often have to brush the toilet twice or more every day. I have to replace one more toilet, and I think I shall consider another brand just for this issue. The height of the toilet is about right for a person with mobility problems. I had no problems with installation, but I have installed several toilets in the past. The toilet came well packaged and there was no damage to any of the contents.
customer_reviews.author: O. jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Will buy another one
customer_reviews.text: The toilet was easy to install fix perfectly. Arrived on time. Works wonderfully, quiet and efficient. It was delivered in a rain storm and the delivery person brought it into the house for me!!! Awesome service! All pieces intact. I will be buying another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and a great fit in a tight space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a tight rough in where I previously had used a 10" rough in toilet but still didn't quite fit. This toilet fit in the space with a little room to spare and it looks nice as well
customer_reviews.author: Chris Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fixed a 9" rough in challenge
customer_reviews.text: This toilet was the perfect answer to an issue. I just pur chased an older home. I had a toilet leaking. I did all the usual steps and after measuring realized my rough in was 9". I read this was 1 of 3 toilets recommended to fix this issue. It was easy to install and no problems since.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Parsley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet, the flushing system is the best I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Muskin

customer_reviews.title: Toto
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. I'm very pleased with this Toto. I installed it at my sons house and he is happy with it. We'll see how the flush mechanism holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Candy H

customer_reviews.title: Bravo Toto!
customer_reviews.text: This product is better in performance and appearance than the two Kohler toilets I installed last year. And I bought it at a fire sale price. Installation was super easy with excellent instructions and nicely packaged hardware. I would surely buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: fred m.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great needed 10 rough was afraid of breaking during shipping but not a problem
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did like toilet but handle hangs down instead of across the tank. Must get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: S. De Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to install, and works great. A real water saver
customer_reviews.author: BigG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, complete flushes everytime with very little water use.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Westman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, the shipping from Fed Ex the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet, especially if you need a close coupled ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet, especially if you need a close coupled toilet. I had only 10.5 inches from the bolts to the wall and a regular toilet just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: simpleperson

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you expect it to do!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to install, uses very little water and does a complete job. . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: MommaMegs

customer_reviews.title: A basic toilet that gets the job done. Only ...
customer_reviews.text: A basic toilet that gets the job done. Only problem: the flush handle on the side is secured by a plastic piece on the inside that broke the day after installation. As a result, the handle comes loose and it will be difficult to flush until we can find a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: A Scott

customer_reviews.title: It'so great, although it takes a bit getting used to ...
customer_reviews.text: It'so great, although it takes a bit getting used to - it's higher than my old one! But I love it!
customer_reviews.author: K8Reader

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, I expected to see made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: As a design engineer I always tried to make my designs "foolproof". Many toilets are definitely not. 1. Why designing 12" rough-in if 10" will fit in 12" space? 2. Why making seat 16.5"or higher (from the floor) if short people need ~15" (a spacer in a shape of a toilet seat under a seat or thicker seat - I've seen them - can easily raise that dimension). I need 10" rough-in, ~15" tall toilet and to find it was a biiiig JOB
customer_reviews.author: Thinker

customer_reviews.title: Toto is worth consideration
customer_reviews.text: After using a 50 year old toilet for 40 years of it's long and mostly trouble free life it came to the point where it took a plunger daily to get things moving. We chose the Toto and get a sense of joy each time it swooshes quickly and then quietly and quickly refills. We keep a brush handy for any streaks that may be left, but the flushing operation out weighs the negative about some streaking. How long it will last or ow trouble free it will be we don't know. At this point we would recommend it and wouldnt hestitate to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This toilet flushes completely and quite quietly, using little water.
customer_reviews.text: This toilet flushes completely and quite quietly, using little water. It is the best of the low-flow toilets i have seen. I will buy it again for another bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Scientist in San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: For a product from a well-respected manufacturer, a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these toilets, 27 months ago. I do like the extra large and well-formed seat, the self-closing lid, the two flush settings, and the near-Home-Depot price (for a product superior to most HD offerings). However, the fact of the matter is, its flushing power is wholly inadequate: for anything other than, a simple whiz, you usually have to flush twice, then, get out the toilet brush and scrub thoroughly, to make the appearance of the bowl respectable.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis C. Morgan

product_meta.title: Toto CST744EF.10No.01 Eco Drake Two-Piece Toilet, 1.28-GPF, Cotton
product_meta.description:
